snippet: As of June 1, Pakistan will require everyone leaving the country to get a polio vaccination, the Health Ministry said Tuesday.
abstract: Pakistan, beginning in June, will require everyone leaving country to get a polio vaccine; World Health Organization had declared spread of polio as an international emergency and identified Pakistan as having allowed virus to spread beyond its borders.
lead_paragraph: As of June 1, Pakistan will require everyone leaving the country to get a polio vaccination, the Health Ministry said Tuesday.

headline.main: Pakistan: Departing Travelers Must Get Polio Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Departing Travelers Must Get Polio Vaccine
